channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Outer Darkness
channel.description:
![EsgkToQU0AEFfM4|594x499](upload://2keNWZ1j6WIKDzgQHmuM8eIJQNd.jpeg) *But the sons of the kingdom will be thrown into the outer darkness, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.* Matthew 8:12
[date=2021-03-06 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-03-06 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MTWrTpCDAPevLte-gOC
[date=2021-03-13 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-03-13 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MTWs0DmXdw2wTt50P9m
[date=2021-03-20 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-03-20 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MTWsW7XarP6Jroj1q0F
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded via Streamyard and put on YouTube assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in March. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.
